TopicTitle: Easiest Way to get a full list of resources of vessel?

Articles.Content:
Instead of creating a list by searching through all the parts in vessel every time I need it, is there an exciting list? 

                            foreach (Part p in this.vessel.Parts)
                            {
                                if (p.Resources.Count!= 0)
                                {
                                    foreach (PartResource r in p.Resources)
                                    {
                                        if (!ResourceList.Contains(r))
                                        {
                                            ResourceList.Add(r);
                                            Debug.Log(ResourceList.Count+r.resourceName);
                                        }
                                    }
                                }
                            }
